entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
